    Processing IPD Partition Survival Model Survival functions

Function reference

All functions

calculate_ae_costs()
Calculate Adverse Effects (AE) Costs
calculate_efs_costs()
Calculate Event Free Survival (EFS) Costs
calculate_markov_trace()
Calculate Markov Trace
calculate_pps_costs()
Calculate Post Progression Survival (PPS) Costs
calculate_treatment_costs()
Calculate Treatment Costs
estimate_se()
Estimate Standard Error from Mean and 95% Confidence Interval
get_sampling_params()
Estimate Distribution Parameters for rnorm, rgamma, and rbeta
l_dsa_parameters
Deterministic Sensitivity Analysis (DSA) parameters
l_psa_parameters
Probabilistic Sensitivity Analysis (PSA) parameters
l_psm_parameters
Partitioned Survival Model (PSM) Parameters
l_sensitivity_parameters
Sensitivity Analysis parameters
perform_economic_analysis()
Perform Economic Analysis
plot_owsa()
Draw the One-Way Sensitivity Analysis (OWSA) - Tornado plot
predict_cumulative_survival()
Predict Cumulative Survival
predict_survival_curve()
Predict Cumulative Survival Curve
run_owsa()
Run One-Way Sensitivity Analysis (OWSA)
run_psa()
Run Probabilistic Sensitivity Analysis (PSA)
run_psm()
Run Partitioned Survival Model (PSM)
sample_psa_data()
Generate Probabilistic Sensitivity Analysis (PSA) Data
